info.name: VK Plus
info.description: ATTENTION: only for light mode. A complete, compact and customizable theme for VKontakte. Before installing, choose the background, page color, images format, among other options, by clicking the "Customize" button. After installing, reload the VK page.

options.label: No ads
options.value: .wall_module .feed_row > .post._ads_block_data_w, .wall_module .feed_row > [id^="postadsite"]._ads_block_data_w, #ads_left {display: none !important}

options.label: Black grid
Light blue
Dark
Dark blue
Gray
Green
Metal
Default
Pink
Red lightning
White
Hidden
options.value:
#side_bar .left_menu_nav_wrap, .blog_right_menu_nav .left_menu_nav_wrap, #side_bar .LegalRecommendationsLinkLeftMenuAuthorized, #side_bar .WideSeparator.WideSeparator--legalRecommendationsLink {display: none !important}
.ads_ad_box_border.repeat_ver {border-bottom: none !important}

options.label: Square
Hidden
options.value:
#stl_left, #layer_stl {visibility: hidden !important}
#stl_left #stl_text, #layer_stl #layer_stl_text {visibility: visible !important}

options.label: Visible and small
options.value:
#stl_left, #layer_stl {visibility: hidden !important}
#stl_left #stl_bg, #layer_stl #layer_stl_text, #layer_stl #layer_stl_bg {visibility: visible !important}

options.label: Gray
Light gray
White (default)
Scrollable
options.value: #bt_reply_form.reply_box_inner_wrap.fixed:not(.reply_box_open) {position: relative !important}

options.label: Fixed (no ads)
options.value:
.side_bar {position: fixed !important; top: 0 !important; z-index: 0 !important}
#ads_left {display: none !important}

options.label: Scrollable (default)
options.value: .body_im .side_bar {position: fixed !important; z-index: 0 !important}

options.label: Visible
Fixed (default)
Scrollable
On the right
options.value: body:not(.is_rtl1) .blst_row .blst_fixed, body:not(.is_rtl1) .blst_row .blst_closed {float: right !important; transform: translateY(1px) !important}
